title: Software Engineer – ML Automation (Vision4ce / Chess Dynamics)
summary: Built and maintained Python + shell automation for data operations and ML workflows. Developed data engineering pipelines (scraping, DB management, indexing/triage), implemented/optimised ML models (ResNet50, YOLO, INT8 calibration), created TensorRT engines, and used Apache Airflow with CI DAG testing. Automated image labelling/patch creation/dataset organisation, built APIs and testing frameworks, and worked with Docker and JSON/XML-based configurations.

title: Freelance Automation & Web Developer
summary: Built responsive WordPress sites (Elementor, WooCommerce, CRM integrations) and created automation scripts/tools to reduce manual data entry (reported ~25%). Developed data extraction and cleaning tools to support client workflows.

title: Retail Floor Customer Sales Rep (Nisa Local)
summary: Handled store closing procedures, merchandising/product display, and stock control. Coached team members for customer service outcomes and assigned daily responsibilities to support smooth store operations.

title: Second Line Help Desk (NHS England) — Internship
summary: Supported technical troubleshooting and documentation/reporting. Participated in workplace safety training including fire training, CPR and first aid.

title: First Line Help Desk (Kaplan) — Internship
summary: Shadowed IT support work and learned approaches to solving IT issues; gained insight into IT support systems and cyber security; handled multiple client calls per day.
